title: Increase header logo visibility (larger + higher contrast) across the app

requirements.text: Update the top-left header logo in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` to be more visible across the entire app by (a) increasing its rendered size on mobile and desktop and (b) improving contrast against both light and dark backgrounds (e.g., adding a subtle background/badge, border/ring, and/or shadow around the logo image).

quotes:
1. App logo(hearder) on the top left
2. Larger size and higher contrast
3. Yes they should apply

acceptanceCriteria: The logo in the header top-left is visibly larger than the current `h-8 w-8` (mobile) / `sm:h-10 sm:w-10` (desktop) sizing.
The logo remains clearly visible (high contrast) on both light mode and dark mode header backgrounds.
The change is applied everywhere the header appears (all pages routed via `App.tsx`).
No other navigation/header functionality is broken (logo click still navigates to the landing page).

requirements.text: If needed to achieve higher contrast, create and use a higher-contrast variant of the existing generated logo asset referenced by the header (`/assets/generated/platform-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png`) and update the header to use the new asset path consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: A higher-contrast logo asset exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is referenced by `Header.tsx` (no backend routing for the image).
The new logo asset retains transparent edges cleanly (no unintended background artifacts) and appears sharper/more readable at the new size.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI primitives).
Do not modify files listed as immutable: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Keep all changes frontend-only; do not change Motoko backend state or interfaces for this request.
nonGoals: Fixing the prior production deployment failure/error.
Changing the app name text ('AgriVenture') or tagline ('Funding Platform') unless required for logo visibility.
Redesigning the overall header layout/navigation beyond what is necessary to improve logo visibility.

edits: Increase contrast/clarity of the logo mark (platform-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png > platform-logo-high-contrast.dim_200x200.png)
